snippet: Marc-Andre Fleury stopped 28 shots for his 250th N.H.L. victory and a franchise-record 24th shutout and Sidney Crosby scored to lead the Penguins to a victory over the Devils in the teams’ season opener.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins beat New Jersey Devils, 3-0, in season opener; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Marc-Andre Fleury stopped 28 shots for his 250th N.H.L. victory and a franchise-record 24th shutout and Sidney Crosby scored to lead the Penguins to a victory over the Devils in the teams’ season opener.

headline.main: Fleury Proves Too Much for Devils
headline.print_headline: Fleury Proves Too Much For Devils
